title: Love Lust
description: Liv Starr craves...and dreads love.Her succubus hunger demands human lust to feed off of. Worse, love is the only thing that sustains the fix and thereby, her life.But long-term feeding will enslave her lover, annihilating who they are, condemning her to a perpetual cycle of love and loss.On the run from her maker, deeply drawn to a new love, she desperately hunts for a cure for this Love Lust.
author: Amber Scott
